sum_bart: The Board of Directors of Force Motors Limited will meet on Friday, 25th April, 2025, to approve the A udited (Standalone and Con solidated) Financia. For confidential support call (+91) 20 2747 63 81 or visit www.forcemotors.com.
sum_peg: Dear Sir, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday, 25th April, 2025, inter alia, to consider and approve the audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31 March, 2025 .
sum_t5: ANNOUNCEMENT REGARDING ANNOUNCEMENT OF ANNOUNCEMENT OF ANNOUNCEMENT OF FINANCIAL RESULTS OF FORCE MOTORS LIMITED
